entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:22 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 2:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
